summary: This is a brief email exchange between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel discussing an upcoming 'Epstein Brass meeting' scheduled for Tuesday and the expectation of receiving a memo by the end of the following week. It indicates internal coordination within the prosecution team.

persons.name: Unknown
persons.context: The sender and recipient(s) of the email discussing internal office scheduling and the 'Epstein Brass meeting'.

events.title: Epstein Brass Meeting
events.description: A meeting referenced in an internal email among U.S. Attorney's Office personnel, likely concerning high-level strategy or updates on the Epstein case.

keyFacts: An internal email within the U.S. Attorney's Office references an 'Epstein Brass meeting' scheduled for a Tuesday in December 2019.
The email indicates the office hoped to have a memo completed by the end of that week.
The communication shows ongoing internal coordination and planning within the prosecution team handling the Epstein case post-arrest.
